entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Maple Plains
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maple Plains 09:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: 5.6°C
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 4.5°C
Wind: SW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this morning. Clearing near noon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
